ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Resources
ygData.msgSnippet: resources exist so that representations of them can be transferred to or from other resources. That s a nice definition to keep in mind. Rather circular, but

"resources exist so that representations of them can be transferred to or
from other resources."

That's a nice definition to keep in mind. Rather circular, but it seems to
make sense :)

Michael
